overview: From the twisted mind of director Randy Spears comes a tale of every man's fantasy. All women want you, and they'll do anything you desire. With their soft lips and wet pussies, they're built to please. Penthouse brings your fantasies to life. Just close your eyes...it's your imaginary life.
tagline: Every Girl Wants You. Every Girl Needs You. Every Girl Has Gotta Have You... Imagine That.
title: My imaginary life
